Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI has the time to give detailed feedback and areas to improve on. Uni tutors are often underpaid and need to mark many many people and providing individual feedback is almost never an option.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Feedback is feedback? 
Obviously you trust high quality feedback from human more and take it literally. Whereas with AI feedback you usually use this to critically analyse your work again.
